name: Ricetta: frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mondstadt Hash Brown.

value.name: Pigna
value.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Marmellata
value.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

value.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
value.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.

value.name: Razor
value.desc: Un ragazzo che vive con i lupi nel Regno dei Lupi di Mondstadt, lontano dalla civilt√† umana. Rapido come il fulmine.

value.name: Frittelle di patate a forma di zampa
value.desc: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Reward from completing the Temple of the Wolf Domain "Trial: Scorching Fire and Raging Lightning"</color>
